name: angular-schematics
description: Ultimate Angular code generation in Visual Studio Code.
author: Cyrille Tuzi

commands.title: Angular Schematics: Create a custom schematic

viewsWelcome.contents:
Welcome to the Angular Schematics extension.
[Documentation and tutorial](command:angular-schematics.documentation)
[Configuration helper](command:angular-schematics.configuration)
[Create a custom schematic](command:angular-schematics.createSchematic)
Some features, marked with a diamond ðŸ’Ž, are only available in the Pro edition.
While this extension is very popular, with 1 million installations, it is not a tool developed by the Angular team or affiliated to Google in any way.
It is months of unpaid work by a single contributor.
So feel free to enjoy advanced features and support a contributor at the same time! ðŸ’–
âš¡ï¸ To celebrate 1 million installations, the Pro edition is currently 50% off for a limited time.
[Try the Pro edition for free](https://cyrilletuzi.gumroad.com/l/schematicspro/1million)
[Activate your license](command:angular-schematics.activateLicense)

Welcome to the Angular Schematics extension.
You have subscribed to the Pro edition, thank you! ðŸ’–
It gives you access to all the features of this extension.
[Documentation and tutorial](command:angular-schematics.documentation)
[Configuration helper](command:angular-schematics.configuration)
[Create a custom schematic](command:angular-schematics.createSchematic)

angular-schematics.schematicsDisabled.description: List of schematics ids to disable.

angular-schematics.schematicsDefaultOpti.description: List of default values for schematics options.

shadowDom.description: Use native "ShadowDom" encapsulation for components and pages

externalTemplate.description: Generate an external HTML file instead of an inline HTML template for components and pages

inlineStyle.description: Generate inline styles instead of an external style file for components and pages

skipStyle.description: Do not add style to components and pages

stylesArray.description: In Angular >= 17, set styles as an array for multiple styles, instead of a single style

selectorPrefix.description: Prefix of the selector for components, directives and pipes

skipChangeDetectionOnPush.description: Do not optimize components with OnPush change detection

skipDisplayBlock.description: Do not add `:host { display: block; }` to styles of components

skipPathSubfolder.description: Generate a flat file directly, not a file inside a folder

externalTemplate.description: Generate an external HTML file instead of an inline HTML template for components

inlineStyle.description: Generate inline styles instead of an external style file for components

skipStyle.description: Do not add style to components

eagerLoading.description: Add an eager loaded route instead of a lazy-loaded route for pages

skipChangeDetectionOnPush.description: Do not optimize pages with OnPush change detection

skipNgOnInit.description: Do not add ngOnInit() method in pages

skipPathSubfolder.description: Generate a flat file directly, not a file inside a folder

externalTemplate.description: Generate an external HTML file instead of an inline HTML template for pages

inlineStyle.description: Generate inline styles instead of an external style file for pages

skipStyle.description: Do not add style to pages

eagerLoading.description: Add eager loaded routes instead of lazy-loaded routes

skipDocumentation.description: Not recommended: collaborators (present or future) may need it.
Not recommended: collaborators (present or future) may need it.

skipChangeDetectionOnPush.description: Do not optimize components with OnPush change detection

skipPathSubfolder.description: Generate a flat file directly, not a file inside a folder

externalTemplate.description: Generate an external HTML file instead of an inline HTML template for components

inlineStyle.description: Generate inline styles instead of an external style file for components

skipStyle.description: Do not add style to components

fixedLayout.description: Use a fixed layout for all tables instead of the default dynamic one

skipChangeDetectionOnPush.description: Do not optimize components with OnPush change detection

skipDisplayBlock.description: Do not add `:host { display: block; }` to styles of components

skipPathSubfolder.description: Generate a flat file directly, not a file inside a folder

externalTemplate.description: Generate an external HTML file instead of an inline HTML template for components

inlineStyle.description: Generate inline styles instead of an external style file for components

skipStyle.description: Do not add style to components

angular-schematics.pathsWithPredefinedSc.description: List of paths with a predefined associated schematic(s).

path.description: A path relative to the workspace folder (for example: "src/app/core-services"). Globs are possible (for example: "src/app/features/**/pages"), it uses minimath, see https://github.com/isaacs/minimatch

schematicId.description: Required identifier(s) of the schematic to preselect for this path (example: "angular-component" or ["angular-component", "angular-directive"]).

angular-schematics.enforceArchitecture.description: Authorize generation only in paths configured in "pathsWithPredefinedSchematic". "error" will restrict generation in other paths. "warn" will warn the user but allows to do it anyway. "off" by default or if "pathsWithPredefinedSchematic" is empty.

angular-schematics.additionalSchematics.description: List of relative paths of local schematics parent folders (example: ["./schematics"]).

angular-schematics.localSchematicsPath.description: Destination path when creating new custom schematics, relative to the workspace folder. Defaults to "./schematics".

angular-schematics.localSchematicsPrefix.description: Prefix for schematic id when creating new custom schematics (example: "mycompany").

angular-schematics.angularForceNgModules.description: Generate components, directives and pipes with NgModules instead of standalone ones. Not recommanded.

angular-schematics.angularForceClassInte.description: Generate class interceptors instead of functional ones. Not recommanded.

angular-schematics.angularForceClassGuar.description: Generate class guards and resolvers instead of functional ones. Not recommanded.

angular-schematics.angularDisableProject.description: By default, for Angular schematics, the extension checks if the destination path is part of a known Angular project from angular.json. But some projects diverge from the official Angular CLI configuration, so, while not recommended, this option allows to disable this check.

angular-schematics.forcedDependencies.description: If the extension cannot detect your dependencies, you can force them here, with the same syntax as package.json. For example: { "@angular/core": "^17.0.0" }

scripts.test:packagemanagers: npm i pnpm -g && cd test-workspaces/pnpm && pnpm install
scripts.checks: npm run lint && npm run vscode:prepublish
scripts.release:patch: npm run vscode:prepublish && npm version patch && git push && git push --tags && npm run package
scripts.release:minor: npm run vscode:prepublish && npm version minor && git push && git push --tags && npm run package
scripts.release:major: npm run vscode:prepublish && npm version major && git push && git push --tags && npm run package
